channel.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
channel.description:
well im finished with the final version of the blade. so feel free to Rate/Hate! here is the V1: [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m461/alcazars0bby/Picture2.png[/img] V2: updates with v2, rounded the handle. and changed some of the concept with the handle. [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m461/alcazars0bby/twilightswordupdate1render.jpg[/img] Final version: changed the spikes on the hilt and scrapped the blade. and sized everything to proportion. [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m461/alcazars0bby/finalversionoftwilightblade.jpg[/img] WIREFRAME: one of the cleanest i have done. [img]http://i335.photobucket.com/albums/m461/alcazars0bby/Picture5.png[/img]
RATE/HATE!

item.source: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate

item.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I like the concept of v1’s handle, but I can see how it wouldn’t be conventional to hold it. The part on the blade where it slims down for a bit seems a little awkward, I like the idea, but it doesn’t seem to fit right there. Or maybe it’s where the point is too gradual. idk, but it looks really good. Don’t take any of those comments too seriously, because it is your model and my creativity sucks. ;D’
^and what dylan said.

Read full topic

item.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

im used blender with this model. well i actually used primitive modeling with this model. which means taking a face, extruding/edit. you are talking about free handing, which is more difficult. and you have your thing set to face so every 3=a triangle face. if you have more questions pm me but try to stay on topic on here.

Read full topic
item.source: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate

item.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
item.dc:creator: @Opium10 Opium10
item.description:
@Opium10 wrote:

This is a very nice model, i’ve always wanted to learn how to make them but this when i make 3 points it makes a triangle and it’s really annoying.

if anyone can help me with tell me why it keeps making a triangle when i make 3 points. They get filled in with white.

Read full topic

item.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Hmm okay. This is just a suggestion, doesn’t need to be taken seriously, but I think of a claymore blade being less broad. It might be that I’m just used to irl claymore look, but I would reduce the x axis on the blade just a bit.

Read full topic
item.source: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate

item.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

the blade was mad out of a cube lol but i do see what you are saying, its suppose to be more like a claymore less sharp but more blunt. and it does come to a point

Read full topic
item.source: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate

item.title: [show off] Twilight blade [final version added!] rate/hate
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Very nice. Love the hilt concept, and try to remember to make your blades out of cubes, to make them seem sharper. Blades tend to be not as round as a cylinder, even when the cylinder is flattened.

Read full topic
